dcterms:creator: Koustuv Sinha
Shagun Sodhani
Jin Dong
Joelle Pineau
William L. Hamilton
dcterms:description: CLUTRR is a diagnostic benchmark suite designed to test an NLU model's ability for systematic and robust logical generalization through semi-synthetic stories involving hypothetical families, requiring inference of kinship relations.
dcterms:title: CLUTRR

dcterms:creator: Pranav Rajpurkar
Jian Zhang
Konstantin Lopyrev
Percy Liang
dcterms:description: SQuAD is a reading comprehension dataset consisting of over 100,000 questions based on a set of Wikipedia articles, designed to evaluate machine comprehension of text.
dcterms:title: SQuAD

dcterms:creator: Adam Trischler
Tong Wang
Xingdi Yuan
Justin Harris
Alessandro Sordoni
Philip Bachman
Kaheer Suleman
dcterms:description: NewsQA is a machine comprehension dataset that includes questions and answers based on news articles, aimed at evaluating the ability of models to understand and answer questions from text.
dcterms:title: NewsQA

dcterms:creator: Matthew Richardson
Christopher JC Burges
Erin Renshaw
dcterms:description: MCTest is a challenge dataset for open-domain machine comprehension of text, consisting of multiple-choice questions based on short stories.
dcterms:title: MCTest

dcterms:creator: Samuel R Bowman
Gabor Angeli
Christopher Potts
Christopher D Manning
dcterms:description: SNLI is a large annotated corpus for learning natural language inference, containing pairs of sentences labeled with entailment relations.
dcterms:title: SNLI

dcterms:creator: Adina Williams
Nikita Nangia
Samuel Bowman
dcterms:description: MultiNLI is a broad-coverage challenge corpus for sentence understanding through inference, designed to evaluate models on their ability to understand and infer relationships between sentences.
dcterms:title: MultiNLI

dcterms:creator: Tim RocktÂ¨aschel
Sebastian Riedel
dcterms:description: bABI is a dataset designed for evaluating the reasoning capabilities of models, focusing on simple tasks that require reasoning over a set of facts.
dcterms:title: bABI

dcterms:creator: Justin Johnson
Bharath Hariharan
Laurens van der Maaten
Li Fei-Fei
C Lawrence Zitnick
Ross Girshick
dcterms:description: CLEVR is a diagnostic dataset for compositional language and elementary visual reasoning, designed to evaluate models on their ability to reason about visual scenes.
dcterms:title: CLEVR
